mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, i_user) VALUES (#{title}, #{title}, #{i_user})
mapper.select:
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.i_user, A.regdt, B.u_nm as WriterNm, B.profileImg, CASE WHEN C.iboard IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isFav FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user
LEFT JOIN t_board_fav C
INNER JOIN t_board_fav C
ON A.iboard = C.iboard AND C.i_user = #{i_user} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{recordCnt}
SELECT A.title, A.regdt, A.i_user, A.ctnt, A.iboard, B.u_nm AS writerNm FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard};
